Package menu

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
base.BaseModel
menu.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Menu
extends BaseModel
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to menu items in the Main Menu.
Since:
2021-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jordon
See Also:
Serialized Form

    private MenuType type
    Type of the menu item (MainCourse, Dessert, Drink).
